<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/admin/workspaces/{workspaceId}/participants/add"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a participant to the given workspace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspaceId","in":"path","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Add member request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"teamId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"userNameOrEmail":{"type":"string"},"memberId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"title":"AddParticipantRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"participant":{"type":"object","properties":{"participantId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"memberId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"userName":{"type":"string"},"firstName":{"type":"string"},"lastName":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string"},"orgRole":{"type":"string","enum":["owner","member","collaborator"],"title":"OrgRole"},"teamId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"teamName":{"type":"string"},"wspRole":{"type":"string","enum":["owner","admin","maintain","launch","connect","view"],"title":"WspRole"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["MEMBER","TEAM","COLLABORATOR"],"title":"ParticipantType"},"teamAvatarUrl":{"type":"string"},"userAvatarUrl":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ParticipantDbDto"}},"title":"AddParticipantResponse"}}}}}}
